findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: Owner can mint and burn unlimited PandoraUSD tokens, which should only be done by the stables manager.

findings.title: Unused `RebaseLib` library
findings.description: The `RebaseLib` library is not being utilized anywhere in the code.

findings.title: Unused function `_claimRewards`
findings.description: The function `_claimRewards` is unused and can be removed.

findings.title: Add `address(0)` validations throughout the contracts to prevent any accidental transfers
findings.description: Adding address(0) validations throughout the contracts is recommended to prevent any accidental transfers.

findings.title: Duplicate NatSpec function parameter documentation
findings.description: NatSpec function parameter documentation is duplicated across multiple contracts and functions.

findings.title: Events are not indexed
findings.description: Events are not indexed which can cause issues with event tracking and filtering.

findings.title: Wrong mentioning of `Convex` . Replace with `Curve`
findings.description: Incorrect usage of Convex instead of Curve.
